newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: PSC unit in $950 mln Mozambique projects.
newsitem.headline: PSC unit in $950 mln Mozambique projects.

text.p: Malaysia's Penang Shipbuilding & Construction Sdn Bhd (PSC), has entered into an agreement to develop ports and rail facilities in Mozambique for around $950 million, said the Bernama news agency on Tuesday.

Quoting a statement issued by Business Focus Sdn Bhd, Bernama said Mozambique Ports and Railways would arrange to provide a financial guarantee from the government of Mozambique to facilitate PSC in financing the project.
PSC will act as turnkey contractor for the development and improvement of port and railway facilities in Maputo, Beira, Nacala and Zambezia Corridor.
PSC is a subsidiary of shipping and maritime firm PSC Industries Bhd, which is listed on the Kuala Lumpur Stock Exchange.
